Privacy Policy for DataStudio Annotation Platform

Last Updated: [Insert Date]

1. Introduction

Welcome to DataStudio, the advanced AI data labeling and model fine-tuning platform developed by Indika AI. DataStudio is committed to safeguarding your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal and non-personal information when you use our platform.

2. Information We Collect

a. User Registration Information: When you create an account on DataStudio, we collect information such as your name, email address, username, and password.

b. Usage Data: We collect data related to your interactions with the platform, including but not limited to the use of features, session duration, and IP address.

c. Data Annotations: Any data you input, annotate, or upload to DataStudio for labeling or model fine-tuning purposes.

3. How We Use Your Information

a. Providing Services: We use your information to provide the core functionalities of DataStudio, including data labeling, model fine-tuning, and user management.

b. Personalization: We may use your usage data to personalize your experience and improve our services.

c. Communication: We may use your email address to send you important updates, newsletters, and information related to DataStudio and other Indika AI products and services.

d. Research and Development: Your data annotations may be used for research and development purposes to enhance our platform's capabilities.

4. Data Security

Indika AI employs industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We use encryption, access controls, and regular security audits to safeguard your information.

5. Third-Party Integration

DataStudio may allow integration with third-party AI models and services. Please review the privacy policies of these third parties, as their data collection and usage practices may differ from ours.

6. Data Retention

We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

7. Your Choices

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from DataStudio.

8. Children's Privacy

DataStudio is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect or store personal information from children.

9. Changes to this Privacy Policy

Indika AI reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our platform.

10. Contact

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@indikaAI.com
